attributes.action: Free school meals or free public transport for children who live more than 2.5 miles from school
attributes.additional_details:
We want the Government to change the present system and allow parents to decide if they want to use their free schools dinners allowance to be used for the cost of public transport to and from school

With increasing cost of public transport and the cost of living. Many parents are actively having to decide between food or transport cost.
